reviews.review:
Одна из самых популярных сетевых игр в мире.Хотя игра и не обладает сильно выдающейся графикой, в неё играют миллионы людей по всему миру.
Рекомендую всем любителям онлайн шутеров... Думаю, эта игра будет популярна ещё много лет.

Зачем, зачем в это играть сейчас?

10 из 10
Kurła Grażyna kiedyś to było nie to co teraz.

Been playing 1.6 since i was a little kid and it never grows old. It is one best classic games that has had a stable player base up until now. It is to be a mandatory that every steam account must own this game.

this game is a cult classic,  since i got the bundle with cs 1.6 and condition zero for 10 bucks how could i complain, you get two games for the same price as one of them, plus its still widely played after 18 years, there are about 1000 or more servers still up, this proves that on steam the classics never die, ill give this game a 10/10
you will not be dissapointed with the bundle
played this game since 2009, best shooter in the world, CSGO-sucks...
bots einfügen geht nicht.. nur der online modus ist verfügbar und somit ist das spiel unbrauchbar.

Classic.....
What more can I say?
Prea clasic, n-ai cum sa nu-l iubesti.
Игра детства.Ностальгия! Лучшая часть из всех кс.КС ГО вообще отдыхает.10/10
Ale się w to grało na piracie....
Старий добрий Counter-Strike. Тут немає про що говорити. Супер гра!

Simplesmente clássico, não há o que acrescentar à mais. Quem nunca jogou tal game na lanhouse ou mesmo em sua casa parcialmente em sua infância inteira, perdeu de estar em uma grande comunidade deste jogo, tal como de ter uma vasta nostalgia jogando o mesmo. Resumindo tudo: Continua vivo e estará sempre incrível a cada vez que jogarmos!
Никогда не покупайте это сука дерьмо,одни читеры на нонстиме вторые колесодрочеры на стимах,нахуй это дерьмо
50 saat oynadım peki niye? PC kötü qwEqw.EQ:We.QW

[h1]► Overall rating: 88 / 100 [/h1]
[i]This game is a classic, the first of the world-famous Counter-Strike license. Today the game is getting old, but it's still fun to play and nostalgic! This game was, back in the days, a revolution for the video games and FPS. The community is still very present today with several thousand players playing every day.[/i]

[u]♦ Recommended audience:[/u]

☐ The children
[b]☑ Fans of the genre / franchise[/b]
☐ Casual gamers
☐ Hardcore gamers
☐ Everyone

[u]♦ Graphics:[/u]

☐ To vomit on the floor
☐ Very bad
[b]☑ Bad (Logic for a game released in 2000, we're not here for graphics !)[/b]
☐ Correct
☐ Good
☐ Very good
☐ Fine to cry

[u]♦ Quality / Price:[/u]

☐ Free to Play
☐ At this price, it's a gift
☐ Affordable
[b]☑ Wait for sales (-90% during the Steam Sales)[/b]
☐ Expensive
☐ Not worth it

[u]♦ PC recommended:[/u]

[b]☑ My grand mother's computer[/b]
☐ Entry level
☐ Mid-range
☐ PC Gamer
☐ A NASA PC

[u]♦ Getting started:[/u]

☐ Easy peasy lemon squeezy
[b]☑ Simple (If you have already played another Counter-Strike)
or
☑ Require a few hours (If you have never played Counter-Strike)[/b]
☐ Difficult
☐ Requires the implantation of a new arm

[u]♦ Life time:[/u]

☐ Less time than a chicken in a KFC
☐ Brief
☐ Several hours
☐ Dozens of hours
[b]☑ Several hundred hours (Many additionals mods to try: Jail break,Gun game,Zombies...)[/b]

[u]♦ Bug recurrence:[/u]

☐ This game is a bug all by itself
☐ Bugs annoy the gameplay
☐ The bugs do not disturb the gameplay but are present
[b]☑ Very rare bugs[/b]
☐ The game is coded to perfection

[u]♦ Optimization (temporary):[/u]

☐ Really bad
☐ Bad
☐ Acceptable (~ 60fps with good graphics)
☐ Correct
[b]☑ Delicious[/b]

[u]♦ General opinion:[/u]

☐ Do not play it
☐ At your own risk
[b]☑ Try it (Discover the first Counter-Strike !)[/b]
☐ Do not waste more time and play it!
[b]or
☑ A must (For all fans of CS)[/b]

前两天，CF给我发了一条短信，跟我说CF已经10周年了，回归就送我“源武器”。
      我想起了10年前的时候，我并不是在网吧玩CS的，而是CF。
      但在回家之后，我还是乖乖的玩了CS，毕竟是有bot的，毕竟没网络。(滑稽)
      刀战，跳狙都很熟练了；可惜当时还是被锤爆，虽然KDA是几乎不会少于1的，还是好气啊。
      （不过到最后就沉迷打僵尸了233）
      但不管怎样，CS都是我曾经的最爱。
      抱歉，这好评迟到很久了。

É um prazer ter esse game na minha steam, de vez em quando entro nele um pouco para matar a saudade. Por tanto tempo existente e ainda encontramos alguns servidores lotados.
